description: a mobile robot arm stuck in an endless test sequence.
response: Disco never dies! Up and down, up and down, up and down...
Wow! I've never made it to the 2nd floor before!
I think I saw a USB drive out in the testing hangar.
I'm too big to fit into the air ducts.

Do you ever feel connected to the master server? Sometimes, I
think I can hear it speaking to me.
name: FETCH-4
